About the Company: L&T Finance Holdings Limited is a holding company. The Company offers a range of financial products and services across the corporate, retail and infrastructure finance sectors through its wholly owned subsidiaries. It operates primarily in the business segment of investments activity. Its product portfolio across four business groups includes retail finance, which includes construction equipment finance, transportation equipment finance, rural products finance, rural enterprise finance, micro finance and financial products distribution; corporate finance, which includes corporate loans and leases and supply chain finance; infrastructure finance, which includes project finance and corporate loans, financial advisory services and equity investments, and investment management.
